item.title: argo-cd
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for Argo CD, a declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes.

  • https://github.com/argoproj/argo-helm/tree/main/charts/argo-cd
  • https://github.com/argoproj/argo-cd

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
argocd-application-controller default âœ… â€” 8 1 Critical
argocd-applicationset-controller default âœ… â€” 11 1 Critical
argocd-dex-server default âœ… â€” 2 1 Critical
argocd-notifications-controller default âœ… â€” 8 1 Critical
argocd-server default âœ… â€” 14 1 Critical
argo-cd-argocd-redis-secret-init default âœ… â€” 0 1 â€”
argo-cd-argocd-repo-server default âœ… â€” 0 1 â€”
argo-cd-redis-ha default âŒ argocd-redis 0 3 â€”
argo-cd-redis-ha-haproxy default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
